Name: R.E.A.C.T
About the game: Compete in a super-dynamic hybrid of arcade soccer and first person shooter! Be active, attack, win. In the new sports game ! Hit the field by yourself or with friends in 1vs1, 2vs2 and 3vs3. Use many Special Perks combinations to make the match even more CRAZY . Create your dream team and become the best! As in classic soccer, you need to score more goals than your opponent during the match. Use a machine gun, rocket launcher or grenade launcher, depending on the situation. PERK SYSTEM You can choose 3 perks before the start of the match. Perks can be selected manually or randomly. Perks are divided into three types: - Weapon perks. - Map perks. - Ball perks. For example, you can turn on gravity, teleporters and moving columns. Each combination of perks creates a unique gaming experience. Find your favorite combination of perks.
